name: Pillow Fight! (itch)
description:
Make the feathers fly!

It's a slumber party deathmatch in this brutally-cute arena fighter! Knock your opponent off the bed to achieve great victory; first to 3 wins, wins it all.

It's like Super Smash Bros. with pillows!

This game is best played with 2 controllers, but you can play on a single keyboard.
